command.name: ui-design:import-from-code
command.description: Import design system from code files (CSS/JS/HTML/SCSS) with automatic file discovery and parallel agent analysis

intent.primary_user_value: Discover relevant UI code files and extract style/animation/layout design-system artifacts into an existing design run using parallel agent analysis (no synthesis phase).

must_not: Do not claim pointers are Existing unless verifiable in repo
No synthesis phase; each agent writes its own completeness-report.json
Base path must be resolved by --design-id > --session > error

p0: Evidence tables pass verify-evidence.js (dual-source docs + TS anchors)
